summary: This document is a mortgage loan application authorization form from Fifth Third Mortgage Company, where the borrower, Brian Vickers, authorizes the lender to verify his financial information. It includes notices regarding the Right to Financial Privacy Act and the Privacy Act, explaining how the information will be used and shared.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the individual applying for a mortgage loan and has signed the authorization form allowing the lender to verify his financial information.

keyFacts: The document is an authorization form for a mortgage loan application.
Brian Vickers is the borrower who has signed the authorization.
The lender is Fifth Third Mortgage Company located in Cincinnati, OH.
The form allows the lender to verify the borrower's financial records and credit information.
The document includes notices regarding the Right to Financial Privacy Act and the Privacy Act.
